posts.post_content:
It's not in the same class as the other two beautiful Matty portrait's currently up for sale in the other thread (nice card's Ed) but it's a gorgeous card none the less. Sgc "Auth" T206 Mathewson portrait (Sweet Caporal 150 Factory 25) *SOLD* Payment via Paypal a-okay. Please drop me an email if interested. Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/t206authmattyfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/t206authmattyback.jpg[/IMG]

Tony,

I Beg to Differ.... This Card is Smokin'... 

I can't see this lasting Long!
Thanks for the kind words Denny & Ed. Matty is now sold.
Wow, sorry I missed this card. Congrats to both buyer and seller. That card is a blazer......!

[quote name="TUM301" post=1015862]Wow, sorry I missed this card. Congrats to both buyer and seller. That card is a blazer......![/QUOTE]

I didn't Miss it & I wish I had, Truly! 

I had to do everything in my power "Not to pull the trigger" on this Sweet Card, E90-1's come 1st these days.

Whom ever endedd up with this Matty is one more for the Richer :D

I believe it went for a Very Good Price too...
